property.name: Traits
property.value: Hobbit. Ring-bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action:Spend 1 ☺ resource and exhaust The One Ring to give Frodo Baggins +2 Ò and +2 Û until the end of the round.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Noble. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you engage an enemy, ready an ally you control. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost of the first Trap card you play each round by 1 (to a minimum of 0).
Response: After a Trap card you control is attached to an enemy, draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an enemy is added to the staging area, exhaust Anborn to give that enemy +5 engagement cost until the end of the round. Then, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Mablung enters play, choose an enemy to get +5 engagement cost until the end of the round. Then, you may engage that enemy, or return it to the staging area.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Skinbark is attacking alone against an Orc enemy, that enemy does not count its Ú.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Rohan. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Rohan ally you control is discarded from play, exhaust Gamling to return that character to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Gondor or Hobbit hero. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached hero exhausts to defend an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, exhaust Staff of Lebethron to discard a shadow card from that enemy.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Condition. Trap.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play Ambush into the staging area unattached. If unattached, attach Ambush to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: The engaged player discards Ambush to declare an attack against the attached enemy.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Rohan hero. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: If attached hero is Theoden, Snowmane loses the restricted keyword. Response: After the players quest successfully, ready attached hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a hero you control defends an attack made by an enemy with engagement cost higher than your threat, ready that hero. Until the end of the phase, that hero gets +2 Û while attacking that enemy.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Lower the cost to play In the Shadows by 1 for each Hobbit or Ranger hero you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Each enemy engaged with you with engagement cost higher than your threat gets -1 Û and -1 Ú until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Ready the Ring-bearer to choose an enemy engaged with you. If the Ring-bearer's Ò is greater than that enemy's $, lower that enemy's Û and Ú by the difference until the end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Play only if you control the Ring-bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Planning Action: Add Brace of Conies to the victory display to (choose 2): heal up to 2 damage from a hero, add 2 resources to a hero’s pool, choose a player to draw 2 cards, or reduce a player's threat by 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Keywords
property.value: The Searching Eye functions like a player card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After you draw this card, either exhaust each hero you control, or reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value:
The engaged player cannot reduce his threat.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value: The engaged player cannot reduce his threat. Forced: After Dead Things destroys a character, the defending player must raise his threat by 3.

property.name: Shadow

property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Keywords

property.name: Text

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey to the Cross-roads

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the end of the planning phase, place each Harad enemy in the staging area facedown under The Black Gate.
If there are at least X facedown cards under The Black Gate, the players lose the game. X is 3 more than the number of players.

property.value: Journey to the Cross-roads

property.value:
While Henneth Annun is the active location, skip both the encounter phase and combat phase, and ignore the Forced effects on stage 1B and The Black Gate.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Great Spider

property.name: Traits
property.value: Artifact. Item. Ring.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: The first player claims The One Ring and attaches it to the Ring-bearer. Attached hero does not count against the hero limit. The first player gains control of attached hero. If The One Ring leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Put Gollum into play engaged with the first player. Each player searches the encounter deck for 1 location, reveals it, and adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value:
The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Smeagol.
Forced: After a player declares any number of attackers against Gollum, discard the top card of the encounter deck. Gollum gets +X Ú for this attack, where X is the discarded card's $.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: If the number of locations in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, discard cards from the encounter deck until a location is discarded. Then, add the discarded location to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value:
Progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.
The players cannot advance unless the first player controls Smeagol and there are at least 4 locations in the victory display.
Forced: At the end of the staging step, if the number of locations in the staging area is less than the number of players in the game, reveal the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Undead enemy and puts it into play engaged with him. Shuffle all locations in the victory display into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value:
While any player is engaged with an Undead enemy, progress cannot be placed on this stage.
The players cannot defeat this stage unless the first player controls Smeagol. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing campaign mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player shuffles 1 copy of The Searching Eye into his deck. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck and each player's deck: HD, RtI.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Passage of the Marshes

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Each player must choose: either take a permanent +2 starting threat penalty, or earn 1 copy of The Seatching Eye. Record each player's choice in the campaign log.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey to the Cross-roads

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add The Black Gate and The Cross­roads to the staging area. Shuffle the Men of Harad encounter set and place it facedown under The Cross­roads. Each player, except the first player, searches the encounter deck for a different non-unique location adds it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey to the Cross-roads

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, reveal the top card facedown card from under The Cross­roads and add it to the staging area.
The players cannot defeat this stage while The Cross­roads is in play. When The Cross­ roads is explored, the players win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey to the Cross-roads

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing campaign mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Each player must choose: either add 1 resource to each of his heroes' pools, or shuffle 1 copy of Brace of Coneys into his deck. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck and each player's deck: HD, RtI

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Journey to the Cross-roads

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Each player who chose to shuffle a copy of Brace of Coneys into his deck during setup has earned that boon. Add each earned copy to the campaign pool. Record the name and quantity of each enemy underneath The Black Gate in the notes section of the campaign log.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Shelob's Lair

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Cleft of Cirith Ungol, Shelob and The Great Spider encounter set aside, out of play. Put Smeagol into play under the first player’s control. Make Morgul Vale the active location. Add Smeagol’s Secret Way to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Shelob's Lair

property.name: Text
property.value:
Progress cannot be placed on Underground locations.
Response: After Smeagol’s Secret Way is explored, discard 3 random cards from each player’s hand to discard each Nazgul enemy in the staging area.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if Smeagol’s Secret Way is in the victory display, advance to stage 2A.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Shelob's Lair

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Shelob to the staging area and shuffle all cards from The Great Spider encounter set and the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Shelob's Lair

property.name: Text
property.value: Shelob cannot leave the staging area and Smeagol cannot attack or defend. Each player cannot play, or put into play, more than 1 ally each round. No more than 4 progress can be placed on this stage each round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Shelob's Lair

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Cleft of Cirith Ungol to the staging area. Flip Smeagol to Gollum and heal all damage from Shelob. Each player places 1 resource on Shelob.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Shelob's Lair

property.name: Text
property.value:
If Gollum is defeated, add him to the victory display. (Do not flip him over.)
While Shelob has at least 1 resource on her, she gains: “Forced: When Shelob is dealt any amount of damage, cancel that damage and discard 1 resource from Shelob instead.”
The players cannot defeat this stage unless Shelob and Gollum are in the victor display. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Shelob's Lair

property.name: Keywords
property.value: You are playing campaign mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Attach A Heavy Burden to the Ring­bearer. Remove each burden with the following burden set icons from the encounter deck and each player's deck: RD, RtI.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Shelob's Lair

property.name: Text
property.value: Resolution: Add A Heavy Burden to the campaign pool. The players have earned that burden.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to non-☺ player card effects. Gollum engages the first player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Gollum engages the first player during the refresh phase, he makes an immediate attack. Forced: When Gollum is defeated, flip him to Smeagol and exhaust Smeagol.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to player card effects. The first player gains control of Smeagol.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After the players quest unsuccessfully, flip Smeagol to Gollum.
If Smeagol is destroyed, the players lose the game.

property.value: Rules Card
